alert.note: Alert for Central Middlesex County; Eastern Essex; Northern Worcester; Southeast Middlesex; Southern Worcester; Suffolk; Western Norfolk (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 28 at 7:29PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Essex, east central Worcester, north central Norfolk, northwestern Suffolk and eastern Middlesex Counties through 830 PM EDT... At 729 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Southborough, or over Marlborough, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Brief heavy rain, localized flooding and winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Locations impacted include... Boston, Cambridge, Newton, Somerville, Framingham, Waltham, Malden, Brookline, Medford, Revere, Arlington, Everett, Billerica, Marlborough, Woburn, Shrewsbury, Chelsea, Natick, Watertown and Lexington. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Do not drive through flooded roads or underpasses. Avoid low lying areas near small streams.

area.areaDesc: Central Middlesex County; Eastern Essex; Northern Worcester; Southeast Middlesex; Southern Worcester; Suffolk; Western Norfolk
